title: Star Wars' Boba Fett actor Jeremy Bulloch dies aged 75
description: The actor was best known for playing the bounty hunter Boba Fett in the original trilogy.

title: Biden cabinet: Does this new team better reflect America?
description: The role of a president's inaugural cabinet goes beyond just policy - let's take a closer look.

title: Dog theft: Organised crime driving ‘epidemic’ of dog snatching
description: Dog theft: Organised crime driving ‘epidemic’ of dog snatching.

title: US congressman Joe Cunningham opens beer to toast bipartisanship
description: Joe Cunningham uses his farewell speech to call on people to "listen to each other, maybe even have a beer".

title: Brexit: What does it mean for security in the UK?
description: The UK will leave more than 30 EU criminal justice bodies from 2021 - but how will that affect everyday life?

title: Advent calendar: Day 17 - England celebrate in style after winning Six Nations 2020
description: Day 17 of BBC Sport's advent calendar looks back on England's glory in the final moments of the Six Nations 2020, when they secured a 34-5 bonus-point victory over Italy to seal the title.

title: Covid: 'Miracle' survivor Mal Martin feared his life was over
description: Mal Martin's family were told there was almost zero chance of survival after he contracted Covid-19.

title: The Papers: PM's 'stark warning' for merry 'little' Christmas
description: Boris Johnson's call for a short, small celebration makes it on to most of Thursday's front pages.

title: Royal Christmas card: Prince William and Kate release family photograph
description: Charles and Camilla also release an annual photo, showing the couple smiling in their garden.

title: Covid: Areas in England await Covid tier changes
description: NHS bosses express concern about "prematurely" easing restrictions in some areas.

title: Google ad practices under fire in new lawsuit
description: Ten US states accuse the tech firm of illegally trying to preserve its online advertising monopoly.

title: Toy deliveries to miss Christmas amid port delays
description: With Christmas fast approaching, popular lines including Lego, dolls and puzzles are out of stock at some toy stores.

title: Coronavirus doctor's diary: 'Have I got Covid for a second time?'
description: Dr John Wright thought he'd had Covid in spring - but last week he tested positive. So what's going on?

title: Viola Davis: 'In my world, there are a lot of Ma Raineys'
description: Viola Davis on her new movie with Chadwick Boseman and how black women are represented on screen.

title: Covid: Cancer scan backlog raises late detection fears
description: Waiting times grow across the UK for potentially life-saving MRI and CAT scans, figures show.

title: Dangerous cladding: 'Fire patrols at our flats cost us £500,000'
description: Years after flammable cladding issues emerged, more flat owners are facing costly 24-hour patrols.

title: Cancelling Christmas: 'They said they understood'
description: As infections rise, these people say they've decided to call off their festive plans.

title: UK and US in talks over mini trade deal
description: US trade chief Robert Lighthizer says he is working with Liz Truss on a deal to reduce trade tariffs.

title: Covid and vitamin D: 'Not enough evidence' for treatment
description: People are still advised to take a daily supplement this winter to keep bones and muscles healthy.

title: Dancing starling spectacle solves power cut mystery in Airth
description: Engineers investigating the unexplained outages found they were caused by murmurations of starlings.

title: How Phoebe Bridgers made one of 2020's best albums
description: The making of Punisher, from break-ups and primal screams to learning how to drive a tractor.

title: In pictures: The beauty of toilets
description: Photographer Elena Heatherwick captures the stories behind them in villages in Rwanda and Madagascar.

title: Our Lives: 'It's not impossible to be happy'
description: BBC journalist Emma Clifford Bell visits Drumchapel, Scotland, to see how lockdown has impacted lives there.

title: 'Christmas is here again' sung by schools around the UK
description: Emma Hutchinson's efforts to create something positive in lockdown led to a Christmas song.

title: Marcus Rashford's mum: 'Sometimes we didn't even have bread in the house'
description: Speaking publicly for the first time, Mel Maynard says sometimes she went without food so her children could eat.

title: Covid: Woman discovers 'thrill' of wildlife photography in lockdown
description: Laura Lake now loves capturing wildlife after borrowing a camera and a zoom lens earlier this year.
